Author: ThatChicBitch
Text: I related to this so hard that I had to make an account and re-find this post just to "same" this whole damn thing.   Seriously, this stupid shit happens to me everytime I go to Starbucks and I don't watch the Barista closely enough. Even if I emphasize every single specific low-calorie-as-can-be ingredient when ordering, there will always be that harrowing moment where I'll take my second sip, pause, and just think to myself... "is this coconut milk I taste? I swear I feel a hint of coconut on my tongue." Despite the fact that deep down in the crevices of my mind where I am still the sane, non-eccentric eating disordered 18 year old gal that I am, I KNOW that it's almond milk and I'm just being a calorie obsessed psycho bitch.   TL;DR; it be like that sometimes, OP. It be like that.

Author: arcoalien
Text: How I feel when I drink anything sugar-free. Super paranoid because it tastes like it DOES have sugar.
